content: pineapple poncho by carolyn calderon the pineapple poncho is a light and lacy garment that can be worn year round featuring a lacy stitch combination with pineapples looks great with with your casual sweats and tank top or over a nice dress for an elegant look too it s very versatile sample is made in size medium see pattern website for details pattern is written in us terms thank you for your interest in my designs have a great day carolyn text and images c the purple poncho all rights reserved
